summary: Adds uncommon/rare ingredients, expands the shack, and new lore to the vanilla Alchemist's Shack.
descriptionHtml:
Designed to be every alchemist's dream, this mod expands upon the vanilla location, the Alchemist's Shack. It adds rare ingredients, puts more plants in the garden, loads the inside with new furniture and storage, and adds lore based on the tree in the back of the shack. To go along with the lore, the mod also adds a new, fairly valuable, potion, which can be used or sold anywhere. If you have an idea of how I can improve the mod or feedback in general, please comment. If you encounter a problem or bug please either comment or create a discussion thread. Please keep in mind this is my first ever mod. Enjoy!



--Recommended--
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57159/?][img]http://i62.tinypic.com/6p2k3r.jpg[/img]

^^Sky makes amazing followers!^^

author: ShadowSneak
